location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 27: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire. In the letter William Digges Latouche and George Abraham enclose an original and duplicate packet (not included) for the Governor General and Council at Calcutta. A request is made for these packets to be dispatched either on the Betsyor on the Bombay.If these ships are not available, the Resident is instructed to send the packets to Narrandas, the English Broker at Muscat, with directions for them to be forwarded at the first opportunity.
